attributes.action: Reintroduce beavers into the British countryside
attributes.additional_details:
Reintroduce Beavers into the British countryside. In recent years the effects on flooding across the country are just getting worse. The government is making no plans to try and prevent flooding and are just struggling to deal with the aftermath,
Beavers were native to Britain for hundreds of years which proves that they will not disturb or current wildlife, that was until we hunted them to extinction.
We ask that the government looks into releasing Beavers into the wild to help our rivers and tributary, which will help stop people feeling the devastating effects of flooding on peoples livelihoods.
